info.title: AnyCrawl API
info.description: AnyCrawl ðŸš€: A Node.js/TypeScript crawler that turns websites into LLM-ready data and extracts structured SERP results from Google/Bing/Baidu/etc. Native multi-threading for bulk processing.

tags.name: Crawl
tags.description: Crawl a site and aggregate per-page scraping outputs

tags.name: Scraping
tags.description: Turn a URL into structured data and LLM-ready data

tags.name: Map
tags.description: Discover URLs for a site (sitemap, search, and page links)

post.description: Start a site crawl job. The job runs asynchronously and returns a job_id for polling.

schema.description: Template crawl mode

success.description: Indicates the crawl job was accepted and queued

message.example: Crawl job has been queued for processing

schema.description: Crawl job creation response (HTTP 200)

success.description: Indicates the request failed

field.description: The field that caused the error

schema.description: Standard error response format for validation errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to authentication issues

schema.description: Unauthorized response format for authentication errors

402.description: Payment required - subscription or credits needed

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to insufficient credits

current_credits.description: Current credit balance of the user

schema.description: Payment required response format with credit information

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to server error

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

schema.description: Internal server error response format

get.description: Get the current status of a crawl job

schema.description: Crawl job status response (HTTP 200)

success.description: Indicates the request failed

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to authentication issues

schema.description: Unauthorized response format for authentication errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to server error

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

schema.description: Internal server error response format

get.description: Get crawl results (paginated via skip query param).

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of results to skip (page offset)

next.description: Next page URL if more results are available

data.description: Array of per-page scraping results produced by the crawl

schema.description: Crawl job results (paginated) response (HTTP 200)

success.description: Indicates the request failed

field.description: The field that caused the error

schema.description: Standard error response format for validation errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to authentication issues

schema.description: Unauthorized response format for authentication errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to server error

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

schema.description: Internal server error response format
Crawl job cancellation response (HTTP 200)

success.description: Indicates the request failed

post.description: AnyCrawl scrapes a URL, turns it into structured data and LLM-ready data. It supports multiple engines, including Cheerio, Playwright, Puppeteer, and more. It also supports multiple output formats, including HTML, Markdown, JSON, and more.

schema.description: Template scrape mode

success.description: Indicates the scraping request was successful

status.description: The status of the scraping job when successful

jobId.description: Unique identifier for the scraping job

title.description: The title of the scraped page

html.description: The HTML content of the scraped page

markdown.description: The markdown content of the scraped page

metadata.description: Additional metadata extracted from the page

cachedAt.description: When the cached content was stored (cache hit only)

maxAge.description: Cache max age used for the read (ms, cache hit only)

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the scraping was completed

url.description: The URL that was attempted to be scraped

status.description: The status of the scraping job when failed

error.description: Error message describing why the scraping failed

data.description: Scraping result data - either successful with full content or failed with error message

schema.description: Scraping response format (HTTP 200) - can contain either successful or failed scraping results

success.description: Indicates the request failed

field.description: The field that caused the error

schema.description: Standard error response format for validation errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to authentication issues

schema.description: Unauthorized response format for authentication errors

402.description: Payment required - subscription or credits needed

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to insufficient credits

current_credits.description: Current credit balance of the user

schema.description: Payment required response format with credit information

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to server error

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

schema.description: Internal server error response format

post.description: Search the web using specified search engine

query.description: Optional search query when using template

schema.description: Template search mode

success.description: Indicates the search request was successful

title.description: The title of the search result
title.example: AlsoAsked: People Also Ask keyword research tool

url.description: The URL of the search result

description.description: The description/snippet of the search result
description.example: Find the questions people also ask. Enter a question, brand or search query. e.g. 'keyword research'.

source.description: The source of the search result

anyOf.description: Search result with URL and description

title.description: The title of the search suggestion

source.description: The source of the search suggestion

data.description: Array of search results and suggestions - can be empty if no results found. When scrape_options is used, additional enriched fields (e.g., html, markdown, metadata, status, jobId) may be present on each result.

example.title: The Investment Case for Digital Infrastructure
example.description: It took just five days for ChatGPT to reach one million users and just two months to reach 100 million users, the fastest of any social media platform or app in ...48 pages

schema.description: Successful search response format containing an array of search results and suggestions (may be empty)

success.description: Indicates the request failed

field.description: The field that caused the error

schema.description: Standard error response format for validation errors

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to authentication issues

schema.description: Unauthorized response format for authentication errors

402.description: Payment required - subscription or credits needed

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to insufficient credits

current_credits.description: Current credit balance of the user

schema.description: Payment required response format with credit information

success.description: Indicates the request failed due to server error

message.description: Detailed error message describing what went wrong

schema.description: Internal server error response format

post.description: Discover URLs for a site using sitemap, search, and page links

limit.description: Maximum number of URLs to return

max_age.description: Cache max age (ms). Use 0 to skip cache reads; omit to use server default.

use_index.description: Whether to use Page Cache index for URL discovery

schema.description: Request schema for mapping site URLs

success.description: Indicates the map request was successful

schema.description: Successful map response format containing discovered URLs

success.description: Indicates the request failed

field.description: The field that caused the error
